snippet.title: Cyber Paradise - An Action Roguelite Tale [Game Trailer]
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: 🎮https://store.steampowered.com/app/2431790
Kickstarter:🚀https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ddmeow/cyber-paradise-a-2d-action-roguelite-game?ref=d5hacl

Fight in a 2D action roguelite world where forgotten memories of the departed linger. Scavenge through ever-changing digital realms and mend lost souls. Build them a cyber paradise. Between fights, unwind in Mini's cafe, where tales unfurl and bonds form.

The beautiful cover illustration is done by BlUEEYESnorton!
